CLBConfig.RunR: rad = 20 n = 3 tab = data.frame(x=runif(n,100+rad,500-rad),y=runif(n,100+rad,200-rad)) X = Solver$Geometry$X Y = Solver$Geometry$Y sel = rep(FALSE, length(X)) for (i in 1:nrow(tab)) { R = sqrt((X - tab$x[i]) ^ 2 + (Y - tab$y[i]) ^ 2) sel = sel | (rad > R) } Solver$Geometry$BOUNDARY[sel] = "Wall" Solver$Geometry$COLLISION[sel] = "None"

Fx = rep(0, length(X)) Fy = rep(0, length(X)) for (i in 1:nrow(tab)) { R = sqrt((X - tab$x[i]) ^ 2 + (Y - tab$y[i]) ^ 2) val = (R-rad)/(R^2) Fx = Fx - (Y - tab$y[i]) / R * val Fy = Fy + (X - tab$x[i]) / R * val } Solver$Parameters$BC0 = Fx*0.001 Solver$Parameters$BC1 = Fy*0.001
